dcterms:creator: R. Reimao
V. Tzerpos
dcterms:description: The Fake or Real (FoR) dataset is proposed for studies in speech synthesis and synthetic speech detection. It contains speech clips from state-of-the-art speech synthesis algorithms, with naturalness similar to real human speech. The dataset includes a balanced distribution of samples between genders and classes (fake and natural).
dcterms:title: Fake or Real (FoR) dataset

dcterms:creator: X. Wang
J. Yamagishi

A. Natusch
N. Evans
M. Sahidullah
V. Vestman
T. Kinnunen
K. A. Lee
dcterms:description: The ASVSpoof 2019 dataset is a large-scale public database of synthesized, converted, and replayed speech, used for evaluating the effectiveness and generalization power of fake speech detection models.
dcterms:title: ASVSpoof 2019 dataset
